title: How to recognize if someone is real or fake - Quora

response.answer_text: If a person is real he never afraid what he has and what he do, but the person is fake he always afraid of everything that from any way if their reality come in front of people . fake people always take care of their reality but real person never cares for these things. because he knows the thing that no one in this world is perfect and no one going to judge me for who i am? and if some one want to judge me let them judge i don’t care about them i know i am perfect in my own way. and everyone is perfect in their own way .

It's not very hard you will know they always let's off hint but trying to figure this out all the time will create problems for you you will look at everyone as if they are suspect even tho they are genuinely nice still if you want to check they try to be as cool as possible to impress people around them provoke them to continue this habit you will know they are trying too hard just to impress
response.upvotes: Answer requested by In Lost World
